about_the_game: This is a short demo for the game Rocket Golf. Enjoy.
detailed_description: This is a short demo for the game Rocket Golf. Enjoy.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.10 32-bit
  • Processor: 2.6GHZ Single Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM (ATI or NVIDIA)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.10 32-bit
  • Processor: 2.6GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM (ATI or NVIDIA)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM (ATI or NVIDIA)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with 256 MB shared or dedicated RAM (ATI or NVIDIA)
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse required

name: Rocket Golf Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz single core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse required
